name: Space Blaster (Bokstret)
description:
This is my 2D Shooter project. 

Modifications:
1) Developed three game levels with increasing difficulty.

2) A script  that generates "first aid kits" in the form of green asteroids (new custom sprite), which restore 1 life up to a maximum of 5.

3) The instructions section is filled with information about the game and tips.

4) A life counter has been added to the game screen in the upper left corner.

Credits:

Created by Wakim Johnny.
